issue.title: [C++, lint] Use clang-format more efficiently in `check-format` target
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4515](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4515). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
`clang-format` supports command line option `-output-replacements-xml` which (in the case of no required changes) outputs:

```
<?xml version='1.0'?>
<replacements xml:space='preserve' incomplete_format='false'>
</replacements>
```

Using this option during `check-format` instead of using python to compute a diff between formatted and on-disk should speed up that target significantly
